favourite.article: Hallelujah! Singing, praying, praising, thanking Singen, be ten, linen, danken Cantar, orar, alabando, las gracias Praise the Lord! I can sing, pray, praise, and thank God in three languages now. If someone could please for the phonetically spell it out for Chinese, Japanese, and Korean. But what about the rest?

To German: singen, beten, loben, danken
中文：唱詩，禱告，讚美，謝恩
English：singing, praying, praising, thanking!
Spanish: cantar orar alabando las gracias
Korean: 노래 감사 찬양 기도
Japanese: 感謝を賛美の祈りの歌
